alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 8:36PM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Frigid wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 to 40 below zero. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills, Livingston Area, Melville Foothills, Northern Sweet Grass, and Red Lodge Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of light snow will decrease overnight with little additional accumulation. Some drifting snow may continue in rural areas and motorists are urged to use caution yet tonight.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills
